name: The Others (itch)
description:
The Others is a game about community—finding it, living it, building it. It’s inspired by urban dramas such as Stand and Deliver, Do the Right Thing and The Wire. Players portray members of a marginalized community struggling to build yourselves and each other up amidst a hostile society.

The Others is Powered by the Apocalypse. One thing in particular that makes it unique is that stats ("values") are shared by the whole community instead of being unique to each playbook.

Playbooks include:

  • The Book
  • The Boss
  • The Drifter
  • The Hustler
  • The Kid
  • The Minister
  • The Provider
  • The Old Timer
  • The Working Stiff
